name: Night Drive (Leah_kuhlman21)
description: Players play as a young college student who is in their senior year of college. This past year has been extremely hard balancing life, work, school, and your relationships. One day your mom asks you to go pick up a few things from the grocery store. You jump in your car and head out to your destination. As you back out of the driveway, you suddenly feel a wave of emotions hit. Your mental health with anxiety and depression hits you, causing you to make a few life decisions as you drive through the night.
